Vanappavesanakhanda：1．Vanappavesanakhanda． The third section of the Bhūridatta Jātaka，which deals with the return of Alambāyana and Somadatta from the Nāga world and their entering the forest for their livelihood．J．vi．170-7．

2．Vanappavesanakhanda． A section of the Vessantara Jātaka，dealing with the journey of Vessantara and his family from Jetuttara to Vankapabbata and their life in the hermitage prior to the arrival of Jūjaka．J．vi．513-21．
